summary: OK SO without going into Spoilers my favourite thing about SHAZAM that was pointed out in one review was the fact that it’s...
body:
OK SO without going into Spoilers my favourite thing about SHAZAM that was pointed out in one review was the fact that it’s really the first superhero movie in recent memory that really focused on working class families and communities? without dressing it up or making it more ‘movie-like’ idk I just can’t stop thinking about it. 


one of the things billy does when he first gets his powers is immediately use them to work for money, and yes, they were silly ideas, but like he’s a KID and once I realized I was like duh, this kid has been running his whole life and he’s stuck in a mindset where he has to take care of himself to survive, because no one else would. he has a lot of emotional walls put up and he never believed he could ever truly find a family worth sticking around for and he couldn’t stop hustling for once second or else he won’t make it by the time he’s left out on the streets again.


he even tells the lady in charge of putting him in foster care: “i can take care of myself.” and she replies: “yes, when you’re 18.” like that’s the voice of a kid with major abandonment issues trying to mask it with independence. but he’s still 14 and he still needs to be taken care of. oh boy, and don’t even get me started on the whole Mom backstory. (I won’t go into Major Spoilers but it felt so real and I was in tears at one point, you can tell that this kid is still young and has a lot of lessons to learn about how Difficult and Complicated adults can be, and unfairly so.)


the foster home is filled with a diverse group of kids and none of them pushed beyond billy’s boundaries when he was clearly not ready to open up yet. they just did their best to give him love and support and be there for him when he needed them, because that’s how they learned to be a family. they even hang out together at school despite being different ages. 


I think it was just an incredible movie that showed how kids going through a tough time can make it through. a lot of people are quick to dismiss or demonize ‘bad’ kids without giving them a chance. the wizard ultimately chose him not because he was perfect, but because sometimes good enough is all you can be. the point is a lot of people aren’t always there yet, they’re not perfect and they’re a long way away from where they need to be, but those people are often the type of people who need to be given a chance. (re: sivana’s, ‘you said I will never be good enough, do you realize what that does to a child?’)


people can never be perfect. or perfectly ready. but sometimes ‘good enough’ is enough to give them a chance. kind of like how you submit a essay and ‘finished’ is better than trying to chase that unattainable perfection and it’s just a story with a lot of heart and hope, and so, so much love lessons in finding your family and being their hero before you can be anybody else’s.

body:
Hey look! Actual hate on one of my stories!!! Isn’t it exciting?

Any ways getting hate today wasn’t something I was expecting but he just seems like a Pissed off male™ to me so I’m not to affected by it?? title: NSFW Alphabet List (Carol Danvers)
body:
Requested by anon: Nsfw alphabet with Captain Carol “Avenger” Danvers please 😉😏

imma request this now because I’ll probably forget if I don’t: nsfw alphabet with Carol danvers - of course after you see the movie - love your blog btw <3

A = Aftercare (What they’re like after sex)

  • Carol is famous for flirting and hooking up with girls casually, but she knew there was something different about you the moment you came into her life. Every time you touched her or smiled at her, she could feel her heart beat faster, and there seemed to be a million butterflies fighting around in her stomach. When she finally asked you out (after much pressure from Maria), there was nothing to stop her from taking care of you all the time. Carol will pull you onto her chest and hold you until you fall asleep. Having you sleeping peacefully on her makes her feel so lucky.

B = Body part (Their favorite body part of theirs and also their partner’s)

  • Carol loves your butt. She loves giving them a gentle squeeze when the two of you are together. However, the two of you can’t be as out as you would like, so she has to be subtle with her touching. Anyone with two brain cells to rub together would know that you two are together, but most people still think you are “best friends”.
  • There are nights when you’re extremely tired, and you just curl up next to Carol. She loves the way you touch her arms as you fall asleep. There is nothing that makes her feel better than when she lifts you up with the strength of her arms. The sounds that you make whenever she pins you down is enough to make her want to do that all the time.

C = Cum (Anything to do with cum basically)

  • Carol knows exactly how to make you cum and she knows it. She will pretty much throw you on the bed and have you every which way before the night is over. However, just because she’s a top doesn’t mean that she doesn’t like it when you get on top. You can make her cum pretty easily, but you’ve learned not to get too cocky because Carol can tease you for the longest time.

D = Dirty Secret (Pretty self-explanatory, a dirty secret of theirs)

  • Being in the Air Force together means that the two of you get to spend a lot of time both at work and off of work together. Most of the time, you, Carol and Maria are off bar-hopping or blowing off steam in the dormitories on the base, but Carol loves sneaking off with you to get some “private time” with her girlfriend. At this point, Maria knows to knock before she enters a room and to quickly close her eyes so that she won’t see anything she doesn’t want to.

E = Experience (How experienced are they? Do they know what they’re doing?)

  • Being the resident playboy of the female pilots, Carol knows what she’s doing when it comes to making girls feel good. She’s had her fair share of hookups, but when it comes to having a real romantic relationship, she might as well be flying in blind. However, Carol is willing to learn what it means to communicate and work hard for a healthy relationship if it means spending the rest of her life with you.

F = Favourite Position (This goes without saying.)

  • Carol absolutely loves getting on top of you and making you squirm (and scream when needed). Feeling you squirm under her makes everything worth it in her opinion, and she can’t get enough of you when she’s extremely dominant. There is also the fact that she loves it whenever you get on top and straddle her with your legs. Feeling you on top of her, grinding into her lap makes everything worth it for her.

G = Goofy (Are they more serious in the moment, or are they humorous, etc)

  • Before you started dating, you thought that Carol was one of the most serious people you’ve ever met. It made a lot of sense – being one of the first female fighter pilots comes with a requirement of extreme focus. However, once you got to know her better, you realized that Carol loves a good joke. She loves it even more when she’s the reason why you’re laughing, and she tries to be as humorous as she can both in and out of the bedroom.

H = Hair (How well groomed are they, does the carpet match the drapes, etc.)

  • Carol doesn’t pay that much attention to what goes on down there because she has more important things to worry about, but she does keep it in control.

I = Intimacy (How are they during the moment, romantic aspect…)

  • Carol hasn’t had anyone who she’s been “intimate” with, so the whole taking care of other people romantically on a constant basis is still a new thing for her. She will do soft, romantic things that will melt your heart such as bringing you food and holding you close when you’re in bed together. She also likes making sure you’re okay after sex, and will stroke stray hairs out of your face with the most serious look in her eyes. When you ask her what’s wrong, she’ll say that the only thing wrong is that she doesn’t have as much time with you as she would like. You reassure her that you know how important being a hero is to her and that you are happy as long as she is happy.

J = Jack Off (Masturbation headcanon)

  • Carol has always been able to find an able and willing partner to get in bed with whenever she has felt the need to get off. Other than that, she rarely ever felt the need to touch herself. Ever since she met you, Carol couldn’t help but think about you whenever she felt horny. Only when she actually slept with you did she realize that no fantasy she could have come up with would have come close to how good the real thing felt. She would rather sleep with you than touch herself.

K = Kink (One or more of their kinks)

  • Carol’s biggest kink is when you take control of the situation when you’re sleeping together. She has to be in control of things everywhere else (she’s Captain Marvel after all), and it feels good to give control over to someone else for a change, even if it’s for a little while. It should come as no surprise that dirty talk is something that Carol is very good at, and she is pleasantly surprised that you’re as good as she is when it comes to whispering filthy things in each other’s ear.

L = Location (Favourite places to do the do)

  • Carol is very old school when it comes to having sex with you. There is nowhere she would rather be than with you in your bedroom. When she brings you to the SHIELD base, she loves having you in her room all day and seeing you blush as Steve asks what happened to your neck. However, there is nothing like being in the apartment that you live in with her because from the furniture to the decorations on the walls, everything has your touch on it, and she loves that so much.

M = Motivation (What turns them on, gets them going)

  • When the two of you are training together. Or when she catches you staring at her when she’s doing something. Basically, everything that you do turns her on, and she makes no effort to hide how turned on she is. If you happen to be training together, she’ll pin you down and make out with you. She loves it when she catches you staring and you blush or pretend you weren’t just staring at her.

N = NO (Something they wouldn’t do, turn-offs)

  • Carol doesn’t really like being really rough with you because she’s so strong. If she uses all of her strength with you she would pretty much break you in half. So instead of using all of her strength, she’ll use just enough to leave marks on your hips. She really likes to spank you when both of you are in the mood for it. However, she doesn’t like to really hurt you, so she won’t seriously hurt you during sex.

O = Oral (Preference for giving or receiving, skill, etc)

  • Carol is a giver in all aspects, so she loves eating you out on a regular basis. Every girl is different, and she will take the time to find out what you like. She will take her time kissing down your body and teasing you before getting to the best part of the night. There are nights when she will spend hours going down on you, and she’ll only stop when she feels that you can’t take any more of her tongue. She’ll come back up with that smirk that you have come to know and love, and she will give you a deep kiss to show that she had as much fun as you did.
  • Some nights Carol is less of a top than she usually is, and you are able to be the top for once. You’re able to take care of Carol like no one else ever has, and she loves that about you. You know exactly what Carol likes, and you use this to your advantage. After eating her out for several rounds, you wink at her cheekily which causes her to get up on top again. She won’t ever say this, but she loves it whenever you wrestle your way on top.

P = Pace (Are they fast and rough? Slow and sensual? etc.)

  • Carol loves being gentle and soft with you. She has seen enough violence both in the field and while she was in the Air Force, so she wants to be as gentle as she can with you. She wants to take her time making you feel special, and this is shown through deep kisses and gentle touches. However, when she gets jealous, she won’t hesitate to leave marks up and down your neck so that everyone can see that you’re hers. There is just something about seeing her marks on you that turns Carol on beyond belief.

Q = Quickie (Their opinions on quickies rather than proper sex, how often, etc.)

  • Carol is definitely the captain of quickies. Although she is somewhat more conservative with where the two of you have sex, she is getting more open to hooking up anywhere. Leaving your legs shaking as she walks away with a smirk makes her day. She knows how to make you want her for the rest of the mission. Carol is horny for you all the time, and she knows you’re ready for anything when it comes to her.

R = Risk (Are they game to experiment, do they take risks, etc.)

  • Carol doesn’t like taking risks when it comes to you because she doesn’t even want to explore the potential of seeing you hurt. However, that doesn’t mean she isn’t willing to experiment with what’s new.

S = Stamina (How many rounds can they go for, how long do they last…)

  • If there is one thing that Carol is known for, it is her stamina. She can just go for round after round when she’s with you. It seems like she can not get tired, and you’re certainly not complaining. Whether it be five quick rounds and cuddles, or one long round that lasts the entire night, Carol can make you cum several times any and every night. It doesn’t take her long to recover for another round, and she’ll be on top of you after only a few minutes. Sometimes, she can be extremely tired and just go for one round, but you’re not complaining because you just want to cuddle with her.

T = Toy (Do they own toys? Do they use them? On a partner or themselves?)

  • Carol doesn’t have that much experience with toys, but you do so you teach her what all the toys are used for. Being a quick learner, she gets the hang of things pretty quickly and becomes an expert in using the toys on you. Things like strap-ons and vibrators have become a regular thing that is used whenever the two of you together. She loves having you fall apart under her as she uses these toys on you, and it always makes her feel good whenever you’re feeling good.

U = Unfair (how much they like to tease)

  • There is no one better at teasing than Carol. She will tease you until you’re begging for her, and then she’ll tease you some more. During missions and such she will be extremely focused on what’s ahead, but that doesn’t mean that you can’t have fun after everything’s over. The moment both of you are safe and on your way back to base, she will whisper in her ear of all the dirty things that are on her mind. Sometimes neither of you can get your hands off each other and will sneak off somewhere “private” on the ship to do your business, and everyone else on the team will pretend not to notice that you forgot to properly button up your shirt.

V = Volume (How loud they are, what sounds they make)

  • Carol is not the loudest person that you’ve slept with. At first, you thought that you were doing something wrong and that she was unhappy, but then you realized that it was just how she was. She will not hesitate to tell you that you’re the best person she’s ever been with (which is usually supplemented with a playful kiss).

W = Wild Card (Get a random headcanon for the character of your choice)

  • Even though Carol is extremely busy with being an Avenger, she always tries to make as much time as she can to be with you. When she does get home (which is sometimes 2-3 in the morning), she’ll watch you sleep for a little bit and then make you breakfast. There are times when being separated gets hard for both of you, but you understand that the world needs someone like your girlfriend to protect it. One of the reasons why you chose to join SHIELD was to protect people, so you understood why she was constantly gone. You aren’t always assigned to go on the same mission as she is, which causes Carol to worry about your safety. Carol does her best to come back home as often as she can so you can spend as much time together as possible.

X = X-Ray (Let’s see what’s going on in those pants, picture or words)

  • Carol has always had a toned body that anyone would be jealous of, and both of you know it. She can easily pin you down during sparring sessions, and she does so with a little kiss at the end of every round.

Y = Yearning (How high is their sex drive?)

  • This woman has one of the horniest people you have ever met, and she makes this known by wanting to have sex with you all the time. She loves being on top of you and hearing you moan her name. Also seeing you in her leather jacket (or wearing any of her clothing) makes her want you even more.

Z = ZZZ (… how quickly they fall asleep afterward)

  • When the two of you are done trying to get on top of one another, you’re pretty worn out. However, Carol sometimes still has some energy left over so she’ll stroke your hair as you fall asleep. There is nothing like having you close to her, and now she can’t sleep properly without having you next to her. Carol wants nothing more than to wake up next to your sleepy face every day, it’s too bad the universe needs saving all the time.

J = Jack Off (Masturbation headcanon)

  • Carol has always been able to find an able and willing partner to get in bed with whenever she has felt the need to get off. Other than that, she rarely ever felt the need to touch herself. Ever since she met you, Carol couldn’t help but think about you whenever she felt horny. Only when she actually slept with you did she realize that no fantasy she could have come up with would have come close to how good the real thing felt. She would rather sleep with you than touch herself.

K = Kink (One or more of their kinks)

  • Carol’s biggest kink is when you take control of the situation when you’re sleeping together. She has to be in control of things everywhere else (she’s Captain Marvel after all), and it feels good to give control over to someone else for a change, even if it’s for a little while. It should come as no surprise that dirty talk is something that Carol is very good at, and she is pleasantly surprised that you’re as good as she is when it comes to whispering filthy things in each other’s ear.

L = Location (Favourite places to do the do)

  • Carol is very old school when it comes to having sex with you. There is nowhere she would rather be than with you in your bedroom. When she brings you to the SHIELD base, she loves having you in her room all day and seeing you blush as Steve asks what happened to your neck. However, there is nothing like being in the apartment that you live in with her because from the furniture to the decorations on the walls, everything has your touch on it, and she loves that so much.

M = Motivation (What turns them on, gets them going)

  • When the two of you are training together. Or when she catches you staring at her when she’s doing something. Basically, everything that you do turns her on, and she makes no effort to hide how turned on she is. If you happen to be training together, she’ll pin you down and make out with you. She loves it when she catches you staring and you blush or pretend you weren’t just staring at her.

N = NO (Something they wouldn’t do, turn-offs)

  • Carol doesn’t really like being really rough with you because she’s so strong. If she uses all of her strength with you she would pretty much break you in half. So instead of using all of her strength, she’ll use just enough to leave marks on your hips. She really likes to spank you when both of you are in the mood for it. However, she doesn’t like to really hurt you, so she won’t seriously hurt you during sex.

O = Oral (Preference for giving or receiving, skill, etc)

  • Carol is a giver in all aspects, so she loves eating you out on a regular basis. Every girl is different, and she will take the time to find out what you like. She will take her time kissing down your body and teasing you before getting to the best part of the night. There are nights when she will spend hours going down on you, and she’ll only stop when she feels that you can’t take any more of her tongue. She’ll come back up with that smirk that you have come to know and love, and she will give you a deep kiss to show that she had as much fun as you did.
  • Some nights Carol is less of a top than she usually is, and you are able to be the top for once. You’re able to take care of Carol like no one else ever has, and she loves that about you. You know exactly what Carol likes, and you use this to your advantage. After eating her out for several rounds, you wink at her cheekily which causes her to get up on top again. She won’t ever say this, but she loves it whenever you wrestle your way on top.

P = Pace (Are they fast and rough? Slow and sensual? etc.)

  • Carol loves being gentle and soft with you. She has seen enough violence both in the field and while she was in the Air Force, so she wants to be as gentle as she can with you. She wants to take her time making you feel special, and this is shown through deep kisses and gentle touches. However, when she gets jealous, she won’t hesitate to leave marks up and down your neck so that everyone can see that you’re hers. There is just something about seeing her marks on you that turns Carol on beyond belief.

Q = Quickie (Their opinions on quickies rather than proper sex, how often, etc.)

  • Carol is definitely the captain of quickies. Although she is somewhat more conservative with where the two of you have sex, she is getting more open to hooking up anywhere. Leaving your legs shaking as she walks away with a smirk makes her day. She knows how to make you want her for the rest of the mission. Carol is horny for you all the time, and she knows you’re ready for anything when it comes to her.

R = Risk (Are they game to experiment, do they take risks, etc.)

  • Carol doesn’t like taking risks when it comes to you because she doesn’t even want to explore the potential of seeing you hurt. However, that doesn’t mean she isn’t willing to experiment with what’s new.

S = Stamina (How many rounds can they go for, how long do they last…)

  • If there is one thing that Carol is known for, it is her stamina. She can just go for round after round when she’s with you. It seems like she can not get tired, and you’re certainly not complaining. Whether it be five quick rounds and cuddles, or one long round that lasts the entire night, Carol can make you cum several times any and every night. It doesn’t take her long to recover for another round, and she’ll be on top of you after only a few minutes. Sometimes, she can be extremely tired and just go for one round, but you’re not complaining because you just want to cuddle with her.

T = Toy (Do they own toys? Do they use them? On a partner or themselves?)

  • Carol doesn’t have that much experience with toys, but you do so you teach her what all the toys are used for. Being a quick learner, she gets the hang of things pretty quickly and becomes an expert in using the toys on you. Things like strap-ons and vibrators have become a regular thing that is used whenever the two of you together. She loves having you fall apart under her as she uses these toys on you, and it always makes her feel good whenever you’re feeling good.

U = Unfair (how much they like to tease)

  • There is no one better at teasing than Carol. She will tease you until you’re begging for her, and then she’ll tease you some more. During missions and such she will be extremely focused on what’s ahead, but that doesn’t mean that you can’t have fun after everything’s over. The moment both of you are safe and on your way back to base, she will whisper in her ear of all the dirty things that are on her mind. Sometimes neither of you can get your hands off each other and will sneak off somewhere “private” on the ship to do your business, and everyone else on the team will pretend not to notice that you forgot to properly button up your shirt.

V = Volume (How loud they are, what sounds they make)

  • Carol is not the loudest person that you’ve slept with. At first, you thought that you were doing something wrong and that she was unhappy, but then you realized that it was just how she was. She will not hesitate to tell you that you’re the best person she’s ever been with (which is usually supplemented with a playful kiss).

W = Wild Card (Get a random headcanon for the character of your choice)

  • Even though Carol is extremely busy with being an Avenger, she always tries to make as much time as she can to be with you. When she does get home (which is sometimes 2-3 in the morning), she’ll watch you sleep for a little bit and then make you breakfast. There are times when being separated gets hard for both of you, but you understand that the world needs someone like your girlfriend to protect it. One of the reasons why you chose to join SHIELD was to protect people, so you understood why she was constantly gone. You aren’t always assigned to go on the same mission as she is, which causes Carol to worry about your safety. Carol does her best to come back home as often as she can so you can spend as much time together as possible.

X = X-Ray (Let’s see what’s going on in those pants, picture or words)

  • Carol has always had a toned body that anyone would be jealous of, and both of you know it. She can easily pin you down during sparring sessions, and she does so with a little kiss at the end of every round.

Y = Yearning (How high is their sex drive?)

  • This woman has one of the horniest people you have ever met, and she makes this known by wanting to have sex with you all the time. She loves being on top of you and hearing you moan her name. Also seeing you in her leather jacket (or wearing any of her clothing) makes her want you even more.

Z = ZZZ (… how quickly they fall asleep afterward)

  • When the two of you are done trying to get on top of one another, you’re pretty worn out. However, Carol sometimes still has some energy left over so she’ll stroke your hair as you fall asleep. There is nothing like having you close to her, and now she can’t sleep properly without having you next to her. Carol wants nothing more than to wake up next to your sleepy face every day, it’s too bad the universe needs saving all the time.

summary: So finally had some fucking time in my schedule to go see Captain Marvel. Not that anyone asked for them, but here are my...
body:
So finally had some fucking time in my schedule to go see Captain Marvel. Not that anyone asked for them, but here are my thoughts.

Pros: very fun, Carol is awesome, Maria is a boss, loved young Fury and Coulson, and I want a flerken.

Cons: writers had to ignore or change like 90% of the original comic storyline to have the movie match the rest of the MCU.

So basically, if you liked those comics, you’ll probably be frustrated with the movie - like I was with the remake of Prince Caspian - but if you don’t have strong feelings about that storyline, you should totally check it out cause it was a good time.

title: Shazam! - Movie Review
body:
Is the DCEU finally starting to take flight?

As you are no doubt aware, the attempts by DC to create their own ripoff incarnation of a cinematic universe hasn’t been going so well. Batman vs Superman, Suicide Squad and Justice League were all received disappointingly by both audiences and critics, but their individual movies have been doing great, to the point that Warner Bros are apparently focusing more on solo adventures from now on! Wonder Woman is the best female-led superhero film so far, Aquaman made over $1B, and now we have Shazam! here to see if lightning can strike twice in a row, which makes me wonder if this new suit is actually an unsubtle message…

Read More
